casebody.data:
In re ADOPTION OF ANDERSON. No. 448PA04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 5, 2005. Michael S. Harrell, Raleigh, for Michael Avery.

The following order has been entered on the second motion filed on the 3rd day of May 2005 by Petitioner Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Petitioner (Unidentified Adoptive Parents) shall have up to and including the 2nd day of June 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of May 2005."
